name: Mission: Sky Dash
description:
Sky´s very quick first mission! 

Flappy birds with a twist forward :D

Controls: 

  • Up-Arrow: Dash (Move up and forward)
  • Right-Arrow: Shoot fireballs to destroy Trees (but you will be pushed back)

The goal is to reach the finish line on the right!

There are 5 Levels + Boss 

Have fun and thank you for playing ^^
